testcase.name: json with byte-array
testcase.system-out: * url demoBaseUrl ......................................................... passed * def Base64 = Java.type('java.util.Base64') .............................. passed Given path 'echo', 'binary' ............................................... passed And def encoded = Base64.encoder.encodeToString('hello'.bytes); ........... passed And request { message: 'hello', data: '#(encoded)' } ...................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And def expected = Base64.encoder.encodeToString('world'.bytes); .......... passed And match response == { message: 'world', data: '#(expected)' } ........... passed
